title: Nvidia $279 billion wipeout — the biggest in U.S. history — drags down global chip stocks
content: In the U.S., chipmaker Nvidia plunged more than 9% in regular trading, leading semiconductor stocks lower amid a sell-off on Wall Street.
summary: In the U.S., chipmaker Nvidia plunged more than 9% in regular trading, leading semiconductor stocks lower amid a sell-off on Wall Street.

title: Volkswagen faces tense townhall as workers battle possible plant closures

title: After Putin dodges arrest in Mongolia, the Kremlin says no one can hold Russia back

title: Ukraine's Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba tenders resignation, parliament speaker says

title: Cathay Pacific confirms it expects A350s back in service within days after engine issue

title: First France, now South Korea — Telegram's legal troubles are only growing. Here's why

title: 'Many doors were slammed in our face’: Spice Girl Mel B speaks of music industry sexism in the 1990s

title: Rolls-Royce shares rise after Cathay Pacific says A350 engine issue affects limited flights
